## Research Overview

Our research focuses on the development of mathematical and computational methods for solving large-scale optimization and decision-making problems. We are particularly interested in hybrid classical???quantum approaches and their applications to complex optimization models.

---

## Research Themes

### Mathematical Optimization

We study theoretical and algorithmic aspects of mathematical optimization, including convex and non-convex problems, relaxations, and approximation techniques.

**Keywords:** convex optimization, non-convex optimization, relaxations

---

### Semi-Definite Programming and MISDP

Our work includes the development of solution methods for semi-definite programming (SDP) and mixed-integer semi-definite programming (MISDP) problems, with an emphasis on decomposition and cutting-plane approaches.

**Keywords:** SDP, MISDP, cutting planes, relaxations

---

### Quantum and Hybrid Algorithms

We investigate how quantum computing techniques can be integrated with classical optimization algorithms to improve performance on challenging optimization problems.

**Keywords:** quantum optimization, hybrid algorithms, variational methods

---

### Computational Optimization and Implementation

We focus on efficient implementations, numerical experiments, and software development to ensure scalability and reproducibility of optimization algorithms.

**Keywords:** numerical optimization, software, large-scale computation
